Class DateTimeUTCValue

java.lang.Object
value.DateTimeValue
value.DateTimeUTCValue
public class DateTimeUTCValue extends DateTimeValue
La classe DateTimeUTCValue gere les dates au format UTC
Author:
Lilou Undreiner, Anne Hugo
